nodes.text: The Spirva sector was a sector in the galaxy which was governed by Callidona Vens during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Following the New Republic's defeat of the Empire at the Battle of Jakku and the signing of the Galactic Concordance, Vens was eager to show her support of the New Republic and supplied them with former Imperial Intelligence, as well as began a campaign to root out Imperial sympathizers within the Spirva sector.
